output: Sorte::abstract_template

Template to build simple single-page abstracts. The abstract title is now
Simple abstract, but can be changed with the "abstract_title" header. Other
options include "keyword_title" and "keywords". The abstrct box width is 120mm
by default, but can be altered via the "width" option.
